alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT GARRETT COUNTY... At 421 PM EDT, a snow squall was located near Accident, or 8 miles southwest of Bittinger, moving east at 15 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with this squall. Locations impacted include... Mountain Lake Park, Oakland, Bittinger, Grantsville, Friendsville, Deer Park, Accident, Merrill, Hutton, Keysers Ridge, Jennings, Mineral Spring, Deep Creek Lake State Park, Swallow Falls State Park, McHenry, Selbysport, Big Run State Park, New Germany, Piney Grove and McComas Beach. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for slick roadways, gusty winds, and reduced visibility. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
